fields.label: Task Template Name
fields.description: Unique identifier for this task template (e.g., RC-VET-001: Initial Completeness Check)

fields.label: Stage Type
fields.description: Which assessment stage this task belongs to (Vetting, Technical Assessment, etc.)

fields.label: Task Sequence
fields.description: Order of this task within the stage (1, 2, 3, etc.)

fields.label: Is Active
fields.description: Only active task templates will be used when creating tasks

fields.label: Is Mandatory
fields.description: Must this task be completed to progress to next stage?

fields.label: Auto Assign
fields.description: Automatically assign this task to a user with the required role

fields.label: Task Details
fields.description: Define the task title and description that will appear in the created WB Task

fields.label: Task Title
fields.description: Title of the task (e.g., 'Review application completeness')

fields.label: Task Description
fields.description: Detailed instructions for completing this task. Supports Jinja2 variables like {{doc.request_number}}

fields.label: Priority
fields.description: Default priority for tasks created from this template

fields.label: Task Type
fields.description: Sequential: Must complete previous task first. Parallel: Can run concurrently. Milestone: Key checkpoint.

fields.label: Assignment & Timing
fields.description: Define who should be assigned this task and how long it should take

fields.label: Required Role
fields.description: Task will be assigned to a user with this role (e.g., Planner, Manager, Planning Support)

fields.label: Required Team
fields.options:
Planning Team
Building Team
Compliance Team
Technical Team
Management
Administration
fields.description: Optional: Prefer assigning to users in this team

fields.label: Estimated Hours
fields.description: Estimated time to complete this task (used for project planning and costing)

fields.label: Depends On Task
fields.description: Optional: This task cannot start until the dependent task is completed

fields.label: Checklist
fields.description: Define checklist items that must be completed for this task

fields.label: Checklist Template
fields.description: Link to a predefined checklist template

fields.label: Checklist Items
fields.description: Define checklist items inline (alternative to checklist template)
